app_descript:
Pixelcut

Brief: Pixelcut is a creative toolkit designed to elevate the digital presence of brands and influencers on social platforms like Instagram, Poshmark, Shopify, and more. It enables users to create stunning product posts and stories effectively, helping to sell more and expand social media reach.
